sources.title: Research: Quantifying GitHub Copilot's Impact on Developer Productivity and Happiness
sources.key_findings: 55% faster task completion, 95 professional developers, P=.0017

sources.title: The Impact of AI on Developer Productivity: Evidence from GitHub Copilot
sources.key_findings: Controlled experiment showing productivity gains from Copilot

sources.title: Measuring the Impact of Early-2025 AI on Experienced Open-Source Developer Productivity
sources.key_findings: 19% slower with AI tools, 39-point perception gap, 16 developers, 246 tasks

sources.title: Measuring the Impact of Early-2025 AI on Experienced Open-Source Developer Productivity (arXiv)
sources.key_findings: RCT showing AI tools slowed experienced developers by 19%

sources.title: The Impact of LLM-Assistants on Software Developer Productivity: A Systematic Literature Review
sources.key_findings: 37 peer-reviewed studies, mixed results, cognitive offloading concerns

sources.title: 2025 Stack Overflow Developer Survey - AI Section
sources.key_findings: 84% adoption, 29% trust, 46% distrust accuracy, 66% frustrated by almost-right code

sources.title: Stack Overflow 2025 Developer Survey Reveals Trust in AI at All Time Low
sources.key_findings: Trust dropped from 40% to 29%, positive sentiment from 70%+ to 60%

sources.title: The SPACE of Developer Productivity: There's More to It Than You Think
sources.key_findings: Five dimensions: Satisfaction, Performance, Activity, Communication, Efficiency

sources.title: Announcing the 2024 DORA Report
sources.key_findings: AI paradox: individual output up but delivery throughput down 1.5%, stability down 7.2%

sources.title: DORA Report 2025 Key Takeaways: AI Impact on Dev Metrics
sources.key_findings: 21% more tasks completed, 98% more PRs merged, but flat delivery metrics

sources.title: AI in Software Engineering at Google: Progress and the Path Ahead
sources.key_findings: Google internal AI code assist research and deployment findings

sources.title: How Much Does AI Impact Development Speed? An Enterprise-Based Randomized Controlled Trial
sources.key_findings: Google RCT: 21% faster task completion, newer developers 35-39% speedup

sources.title: How Google Uses AI to Speed Up Code Migrations by 50%
sources.key_findings: AI wrote 75% of migration code, 50% productivity increase

sources.title: How is Google Using AI for Internal Code Migrations?
sources.key_findings: 32-bit to 64-bit migration, years reduced to months

sources.title: Coding on Copilot: 2023 Data Suggests Downward Pressure on Code Quality
sources.key_findings: Code churn doubled, copy/paste grew from 8.3% to 12.3%, refactoring dropped from 25% to <10%

sources.title: AI Copilot Code Quality: 2025 Data Suggests 4x Growth in Code Clones
sources.key_findings: 211M lines analyzed, 4x growth in code clones, refactoring from 24.1% to 9.5%

sources.title: Do Users Write More Insecure Code with AI Assistants?
sources.key_findings: AI assistant users wrote less secure code, more likely to believe code was secure

sources.title: Dan Boneh and Team Find Relying on AI is More Likely to Make Your Code Buggier
sources.key_findings: Stanford study showing AI assistant users produce less secure code

sources.title: Veracode 2025 GenAI Code Security Report
sources.key_findings: 45% of AI-generated code had security flaws, 100+ LLMs tested, Java 72% failure rate

sources.title: AI-Generated Code Security Risks: What Developers Must Know
sources.key_findings: 45% vulnerability rate, larger models no better than smaller ones

sources.title: AI vs Human Code Gen Report: AI Code Creates 1.7x More Issues
sources.key_findings: 10.83 issues per AI PR vs 6.45 human, 1.4x more critical issues

sources.title: Speed at the Cost of Quality? The Impact of LLM Agent Assistance on Software Development
sources.key_findings: 806 repos tracked, velocity gains transient, persistent technical debt increases

sources.title: Booking.com Uses DX to Measure AI's Impact on Developer Productivity
sources.key_findings: 3500 engineers, 16% higher throughput for daily AI users, 15-point satisfaction increase

sources.title: Palo Alto Networks Boosts 2,000 Developers' Productivity Using AI
sources.key_findings: 2000 developers, up to 40% productivity increase, avg 25%, phased rollout

sources.title: Experience with GitHub Copilot for Developer Productivity at ZoomInfo
sources.key_findings: 400+ developers, 33% acceptance rate, 20% time savings, 72% satisfaction

sources.title: Atlassian State of Developer Experience Report 2025
sources.key_findings: 99% saving time with AI, 68% save 10+ hrs/week, 50% lose 10+ hrs to non-coding

sources.title: Enhancing Code Quality at Scale with AI-Powered Code Reviews
sources.key_findings: Microsoft internal AI review leading to GitHub Copilot for PR Reviews

sources.title: Does GitHub Copilot Improve Code Quality? Here's What the Data Says
sources.key_findings: Readability +3.62%, reliability +2.94%, maintainability +2.47%

sources.title: Scaling Code Reviews: Adapting to a Surge in AI-Generated Code
sources.key_findings: 30% code volume increase, PRs expanded beyond 20 files and 1000 lines

sources.title: Human-Written vs. AI-Generated Code: A Large-Scale Study of Defects, Vulnerabilities, and Complexity
sources.key_findings: Large-scale comparison of defect rates between human and AI code

sources.title: Is LLM-Generated Code More Maintainable & Reliable than Human-Written Code?
sources.key_findings: AI code simpler but more prone to unused constructs and hardcoded debugging

sources.title: AI Coding Is Now Everywhere. But Not Everyone Is Convinced.
sources.key_findings: Overview of AI coding adoption and skepticism landscape

sources.title: My LLM Coding Workflow Going Into 2026
sources.key_findings: Practical workflow patterns for effective LLM use in development

sources.title: The Next Two Years of Software Engineering
sources.key_findings: Predictions for AI impact on software engineering 2025-2027

sources.title: A Deep Dive into Large Language Models for Automated Bug Localization and Repair
sources.key_findings: LLM approaches for bug localization at token level

sources.title: Rethinking Code Review Workflows with LLM Assistance: An Empirical Study
sources.key_findings: 73.8% automated comments resolved but PR closure time increased

sources.title: Replit 2025: Year in Review
sources.key_findings: Agent-first platform, 5M apps created, 500K businesses, 40-60% dev time reduction

sources.title: Six-Step Decision Framework for LLM Adoption
sources.key_findings: Systematic framework from assessment to deployment

sources.title: Walking the Tightrope of LLMs for Software Development: A Practitioners' Perspective
sources.key_findings: 22 practitioners, benefits and disadvantages of LLM adoption

sources.title: Measuring AI Code Assistants and Agents
sources.key_findings: Frameworks for measuring AI tool impact on developer productivity

sources.title: AI Is Already Writing About 30% of Code at Microsoft and Google
sources.key_findings: 30% of new code at Google and Microsoft is AI-generated

sources.title: AI Code Looks Fine Until the Review Starts
sources.key_findings: Senior dev original contributions dropped 19%, review workload up 6.5%

sources.title: Why AI Coding Speed Gains Disappear in Code Reviews
sources.key_findings: Copilot-heavy PRs take 26% longer to review
